7 
8 # 3rd party modules
9 import pygame
10 
11 # Local modules
12 from visualizer.asset import Image, Rectangle, Lines, Circle
13 
14 class Window(object):
15  """Interfaces PyGame for rendering."""
16 
17  BACKGROUND_COLOR = (0, 0, 0)
18  GOAL_COLOR = (0, 200, 0)
19  WALL_COLOR = (0, 0, 0)
20 
21  class ShutdownError(Exception):
22  """Exception for when pygame is shut down"""
23  pass
24 
25  def __init__(self, map_width, map_length, wall_thickness, name='Rocket League Visualizer'):
26  # Support for 1080p monitors
27  self.scaling = 1080 * 0.5 / (map_length + (wall_thickness*2.))
28 
29  self.window_length = int(
30  (map_length + (wall_thickness*2.)) * self.scaling)
31  self.window_width = int(
32  (map_width + (wall_thickness*2.)) * self.scaling)
33 
34  self.assets = {}
35 
36  pygame.display.init()
37  pygame.display.set_caption(name)
38  self._screen = pygame.display.set_mode(
39  (self.window_width, self.window_length))
40 
41  def createAsset(self, id, width, length, initPos=None, imgPath=None, color=None, radius=None, lines=False, circle=False):
42  width = int(width * self.scaling)
43  length = int(length * self.scaling)
44 
45  if lines:
46  self.assets[id] = Lines(color)
47  elif circle:
48  radius = int(radius * self.scaling)
49  self.assets[id] = Circle(color, radius)
50  elif imgPath is None:
51  self.assets[id] = Rectangle(width, length, color)
52  else:
53  self.assets[id] = Image(width, length, imgPath)
54 
55  if initPos is not None:
56  self.updateAssetPos(id, initPos[0], initPos[1])
57 
58  def updateAssetPos(self, id, x, y):
59  # Adjust for simulation coordinate frame
60  x = self.window_length - \
61  (int(x * self.scaling) + (self.window_length // 2))
62  y = self.window_width - \
63  (int(y * self.scaling) + (self.window_width // 2))
64  self.assets[id].setPos(y, x)
65 
66  def updateAssetRadius(self, id, radius):
67  radius = int(radius * self.scaling)
68  self.assets[id].setRadius(radius)
69 
70  def updateAssetAngle(self, id, angle):
71  self.assets[id].setAngle(angle)
72 
73  def resetAssetLines(self, id):
74  self.assets[id].resetPoints()
75 
76  def show(self):
77  for event in pygame.event.get():
78  if event.type == pygame.QUIT:
79  pygame.quit()
80  raise self.ShutdownError()
81 
82  self._screen.fill(self.BACKGROUND_COLOR)
83  for asset in self.assets.values():
84  asset.blit(self._screen)
85 
86  pygame.display.flip()
